DOC.brief_summary: Observational , cross sectional study , carry help pre-designed pre-tested questionnaire research hypothesis : Knowledge perception regard JSSK RBSK nursing student well compare in-service nurse well patients/patient attendant ( attend LHMC associated hospital , New Delhi , India )
DOC.brief_title: Knowledge Perceptions Regarding JSSK RBSK Patients Nurses : A Comparative Study
DOC.detailed_description: The objective study : 1 . To study knowledge perception regard JSSK RBSK program patients/patient attendant , nurse student in-service nurse attend LHMC associated hospital . 2 . To compare knowledge perception regard JSSK RBSK program patients/patient attendant , nurse student in-service nurse attend LHMC associated hospital . 3 . To identify factor contribute knowledge regard JSSK RBSK program patients/patient attendant , nurse student in-service nurse attend LHMC associated hospital .
DOC.criteria: Group 1 ) Patients/Attendants : All study subject must female . Age 18 year . Written inform consent participate study . Group 2 ) Nursing Student : Students / intern College nursing LHMC pursue Bsc Nursing Written inform consent participate study Group 3 ) Inservice Nurses : Posted Department Paediatrics indoor/OPD/wellbaby clinics/immunisation clinic Department Gynaecology Obstetrics indoor/OPD/emergency/Antenatal clinics/Postnatal clinic Lady Hardinge Medical College associate hospital . Written inform consent participate study Males patient/attendant group 1
